Blurs | Hide your browser info

Protect your browser privacy while screen sharing, streaming, or browsing.

--- Benefits ---

1. Enhanced privacy: Protect yourself from sharing private or sensitive data during screen sharing and streaming sessions.

2. Save time on post-production: Reduce the need for post-production editing for screen recording and taking screenshots.

3. Complete control over your browser: Gain fine-tuned control over what parts of your browser to blur or filter.

4. Better screen sharing experience: Remove the risk of sharing personal, business, or sensitive information during meetings.

--- Features ---

1. Custom filter types: Filters like pixelation, blurs, or solid boxes for customized and enhanced privacy.

2. Sticky filters: With filters that stick to the screen, you can spend more time on your work and less on hiding your screen.

3. Safe mode for your browser: Enabling safe mode blurs all tabs for maximum privacy.

4. Filter once, use always: Re-use your saved blurs and filters automatically.

--- Support ---

For support and your questions, please visit Blurs' website, https://www.blurs.app, or send an email to support@blurs.app
